overview: Igor is multitasking force from Slovenian era of new entrepreneurs. Owner and co-investor of two startups based in Slovenia (for now), NegoLab and Amplio. Does business a bit differently as most of the startups. Both are high tech software companies with their own products.

video_embeds.description: VoiceTask application is a simple and handy voice recorder with possibility of sending recordings to any E-mail inbox in MP3 format.
